Bad Idea, Friend.name: Bad Idea, Friend
Bad Idea, Friend.flavor: The first time an enemy attacks you, that opponent discovers just how bad an idea that is.
Bad Idea, Friend.trigger: An adjacent enemy makes a melee attack against you for the first time during this encounter, and you are not granting combat advantage.
Bad Idea, Friend.effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to all defenses against the enemy’s attack. If the attack misses, the enemy takes double your Shadow Assassin’s Riposte damage.

Killer's Eye.name: Killer's Eye
Killer's Eye.flavor: You strike with a killer’s eye, seeking to take down your enemy as quickly and efficiently as possible.
Killer's Eye.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Killer's Eye.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if the target hasn’t taken any actions during the encounter.

Final Blow.name: Final Blow
Final Blow.flavor: Your enemy is seriously wounded. This shot will finish it off.
Final Blow.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Final Blow.onHit: 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you shift a number of squares up to your Charisma modifier. You must end this shift adjacent to an enemy.
